headline: Is Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) Still Attractive After A 34% One Year Share Price Slide
summary: If you are wondering whether Arthur J. Gallagher at around US$215.98 is still a fair deal or starting to look stretched, you are asking the right question for this stock. The share price has seen a mixed run, with a 0.9% gain over the last week, a 14.7% decline over the last month, a 15.6% decline year to date and a 34.3% decline over the last year, set against longer term returns of 18.5% over three years and 87.2% over five years. Recent coverage around Arthur J. Gallagher has focused on...

headline: Piper Sandler Lowers Arthur J. Gallagher (AJG) Valuation as Insurance Sector Faces Pressure
summary: Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE:AJG) is included among the 13 Most Promising Long-Term Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On February 23, Piper Sandler lowered its price recommendation on Arthur J. Gallagher & Co. (NYSE:AJG) to $226 from $249. The firm maintained a Neutral rating on the shares.
